main event: A yellowish orange oval light was sighted traveling from east to west in Charlottesville, Virginia.
interesting points: The object had an undulating motion and was estimated to be larger than any planet,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes while the object moved slightly,It was observed again about 15 minutes later from the west at high altitude,The object had flashing landing lights that were not navigational lights,The incident was reported to local civil defense aircraft spotters.
